alert.note: Alert for Frontier (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A thunderstorm with heavy rainfall will impact portions of western Frontier County through 215 PM CDT... At 128 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm with heavy rainfall 14 miles north of McCook, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Curtis, Stockville, Maywood, Quick and Dancing Leaf Earth Lodge. This includes Highway 83 between mile markers 29 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
